mapper.select: SELECT ing.ingredient_id, ing.category_id, ing.ingredient_name, ing.price, ing.image_id, c.category_name, img.img_url AS imgURL FROM ingredient_tb ing INNER JOIN category_tb c ON ing.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN image_tb img ON ing.image_id = img.image_id WHERE c.category_name = #{categoryName} AND c.category_type = 'ingredient' ORDER BY ing.ingredient_id
